TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示网页内的一个 HTML 元素。

span.span: Represents an HTML element inside of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 HTML 文档中的元素的任何可能的类型，如`BODY`， `TABLE`，和`FORM`，等等。 represents any possible type of element in an HTML document, such as `BODY`, `TABLE`, and `FORM`, among others. 该类会公开你可能需要查找所有元素的最常见属性。The class exposes the most common properties you can expect to find on all elements. 大多数元素可以拥有*子元素*： 放置在其下其他 HTML 元素。Most elements can have *child elements*: other HTML elements that are placed underneath them. 使用属性来测试是否给定的元素没有子级，和要循环访问这些集合。Use the property to test whether a given element has children, and the collection to iterate through them. 属性返回中嵌套的当前元素。The property returns the in which the current element is nested. 你经常需要访问特性、 属性和方法不直接公开的基础元素，如`SRC`属性`IMG`元素或`Submit`方法`FORM`。You often need access to attributes, properties, and methods on the underlying element that are not directly exposed by , such as the `SRC` attribute on an `IMG` element or the `Submit` method on a `FORM`. 和方法使你能够检索并更改任何属性或属性上的特定元素，而提供访问未公开中托管的文档对象模型 (DOM) 的任何方法。The and methods enable you to retrieve and alter any attribute or property on a specific element, while provides access to any methods not exposed in the managed Document Object Model (DOM). 如果你的应用程序具有非托管代码权限，你还可以访问未公开的属性和方法属性。If your application has unmanaged code permission, you can also access unexposed properties and methods with the attribute. 使用用于测试元素是否是特定类型的属性。Use the property to test whether an element is of a specific type. 在运行时，可以修改任何 HTML 文档。Any HTML document can be modified at run time. 你可以创建新对象与方法，并将它们添加到另一个元素使用或方法。You can create new objects with the method of , and add them to another element using the or methods. 此外可以创建作为 HTML 标记的元素，并将它们分配给现有元素的属性。You can also create the elements as HTML tags and assign them to an existing element's property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查任意 HTML 文档和派生描述的 HTML 元素，带缩进的字符串和等级编号，用于指示如何深嵌套元素文档中。The following code example shows how to examine an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the HTML elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序主机控件名为`WebBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application hosts a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM)，可更改此的多种方式将 HTML 文件的运行时内容。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) enables you to alter the run-time contents of an HTML file in a number of ways. 使用将新元素添加到现有的文档，或在页上移动的元素。Use to add new elements to an existing document, or to move an element on the page. 如果元素已经有父级，将一个元素追加到另一个元素将自动该元素从删除以前的父级。If an element has already been parented, appending an element to another element will automatically remove that element from its previous parent. 在运行时使用的文档中任何增加在调用时不会保留方法控件。Any additions made to a document at run-time using will not be persisted when you call the method on the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建新的超链接使用方法并将其结束添加页使用的`AppendChild`上`BODY`元素。The following code example creates a new hyperlink using the method and adds it to end of a page using `AppendChild` on the `BODY` element. 该示例要求你的应用程序包含控件名为`WebBrowser1`。The example requires that your application contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. summary.span: 为 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 上的命名事件添加事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理文档对象模型 (DOM) 公开的选择数目的事件。The Managed Document Object Model (DOM) exposes only a select number of events. 仅为特定类型的元素，则定义大部分未公开的事件如`submit`事件，即仅在上有效`FORM`元素。Most of the unexposed events are only defined for specific types of elements; such as the `submit` event, which is valid only on `FORM` elements. 使用将事件处理程序添加到这些未公开的事件。Use to add an event handler to these unexposed events. 文档完成加载之前，不应将事件附加到文档或其对象之一。You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading. 中的最早，应调用此方法是事件控件。The earliest you should call this method is in the event of the control. 有关可用的非托管事件的详细信息，请参阅[上托管 HTML 文档对象模型访问未公开成员](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)和给定接口：[给定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876)， [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877)， [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878)， [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879)。For more information about the available unmanaged events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md) and the IHTMLElement interfaces: [IHTMLElement](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876), [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877), [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878), [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多在某一 HTML 文件内的元素可以在其下的其他 HTML 元素。Many of the elements inside of an HTML file can have other HTML elements underneath them. 集合提供简单的机制，用于浏览文档树结构。The collection provides a simple mechanism for exploring the tree structure of a document. 仅显示其直接父元素是当前元素的元素。 only exposes elements whose direct parent is the current element. 如果你有为`TABLE`元素，将为你提供的所有`TR`（行） 元素内的`TABLE`。If you have an for a `TABLE` element, will give you all of the `TR` (row) elements inside of the `TABLE`. 若要检索`TD`（单元格） 元素内包含`TR`元素，你将需要使用两种针对每个单个集合`TR`元素或使用集合。To retrieve the `TD` (cell) elements contained inside of the `TR` elements, you will need to use either the collection on each individual `TR` element, or use the collection on . 不保证此集合中的元素都是按源顺序排列。Elements in this collection are not guaranteed to be in source order. 如果是`false`，`Children`将始终为空。If is `false`, `Children` will always be empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查一个任意 HTML 文档并派生描述的元素，带缩进的字符串和等级编号，用于指示如何深嵌套元素文档中。The following code example examines an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 这是通过搜索`Children`的所有元素以递归方式，从顶部的文档的 HTML 元素开始的集合。It does this by searching the `Children` collection of all elements recursively, starting with the HTML element at the top of the document. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序具有控件名为`WebBrowser1`。This code example requires that your application has a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以取消的默认操作为通过设置的元素上的事件属性类到`true`。You can cancel the default action for a event on an element by setting the property of the class to `true`. A在元素上的事件也会在该元素的父元素上以及在类本身，除非你设置属性类到`true`。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. 如果用户单击在不当前具有输入焦点的元素上事件发生一次后事件，但之前该元素的事件。If the user clicks on an element that does not currently have input focus, the event will occur after the event, but before the event for that element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlElement1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些 HTML 页可以承载框架使用`FRAMESET`标记。Some HTML pages can host frames using the `FRAMESET` tags. 在此情况下，每个单独`FRAME`元素将包含自己的实例。In this case, each individual `FRAME` element will contain its own instance of . 当你具有从事件处理程序中收到元素的引用，此属性是最有用，并且需要对文档元素驻留在其中执行某些操作。This property is most useful when you have received a reference to an element in an event handler from the , and need to perform some action on the document in which the element resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是包装的 Internet 资源管理器文档对象模型 (DOM)，它们编写使用组件对象模型 (COM)。 is a wrapper for the Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM), which is written using the Component Object Model (COM). 如果你需要访问未公开的属性或方法的基础 COM 接口，例如`IHTMLElement`，可用于此对象查询它们。If you need to access unexposed properties or methods on the underlying COM interfaces, such as `IHTMLElement`, you can use this object to query for them. 若要使用的非托管的接口，你将需要 MSHTML 库 (mshtml.dll) 导入你的应用程序。In order to use the unmanaged interfaces, you will need to import the MSHTML library (mshtml.dll) into your application. 但是，你还可以执行未公开的属性和方法使用`Invoke`方法。However, you can also execute unexposed properties and methods using the `Invoke` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用非托管的接口能够拍摄当前选定的文本，并将其转换为超链接，用户所选择的 url。The following code example uses unmanaged interfaces to take the currently selected text and convert it into a hyperlink, with the URL chosen by the user. 编写此代码时，假设你的窗体具有控件名为`WebBrowser1`，并且作为对你的项目的引用添加了非托管的 MSHTML 库。This code was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have added the unmanaged MSHTML library as a reference to your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本拖动到以下位置时，将发生此事件：This event occurs when text is dragged to the following locations: - 内部或之间中承载的 HTML 页面控件或 Internet 资源管理器Within or between HTML pages hosted in the control or Internet Explorer - 到其他应用程序To another application - 到 Windows 桌面To the Windows desktop 你可以取消的默认操作为通过设置的元素上的事件属性类到`true`。You can cancel the default action for a event on an element by setting the property of the class to `true`. A在元素上的事件也会在该元素的父元素上以及在类本身，除非你设置属性类到`true`。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`HtmlElement1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有几种方法来将新元素添加到一个现有的 HTML 页，比如和方法。There are several ways to add new elements to an existing HTML page, such as the and methods. 使用通常是添加新的内容，当您必须在将新元素上设置多个属性或样式时的最快方法。Using is often the fastest way to add new content when you have to set many attributes or styles on your new elements. 不同于在于不会包括表示正在调用的对象的 HTML。 differs from in that will not include the HTML that represents the object you are calling. 请参阅有关这两个属性之间的差异的详细信息。See for more information about the difference between these two properties. 设置销毁任何以前追加到此元素的子级。Setting destroys any children previously appended to the element. 如果您从 DOM 中检索元素并将新的 html 代码分配给其父级的属性，引用与该元素将无意义，而且在它调用其属性和方法时其行为是不确定。If you retrieve an element from the DOM and then assign new HTML to its parents' property, your reference to that element will be useless, and its behavior when it calls its properties and methods is undefined. 对于某些元素，设置不是有效的操作。For some elements, setting is not a valid operation. 一些 HTML 标记具有没有结束标记，如`IMG`标记，并因此不能包含嵌套的元素。Some HTML tags have no closing tag, such as the `IMG` tag, and therefore cannot contain nested elements. 一些标记，如`SCRIPT`标记中，只能包含文本内容; 设置将导致错误。Some tags, such as the `SCRIPT` tag, can only contain text content; setting will result in an error. 两种类型的标记，属性将返回`false`。For both types of tags, the property will return `false`. 但是，你还不能设置上`TABLE`和`TR`元素，作为指定给这些元素的格式不正确的 HTML 可能会损坏文档的呈现。However, you also cannot set on `TABLE` and `TR` elements, as assigning malformed HTML to these elements could corrupt the rendering of the document. 使用或`insertRow`和`insertCell`方法上的非托管`IHTMLTable`接口来添加行和单元格到`TABLE`。Use or the `insertRow` and `insertCell` methods on the unmanaged `IHTMLTable` interface to add rows and cells to a `TABLE`. 如果你只需将文本分配给某个元素而不是 HTML 标记，使用属性改为。If you need only to assign text to an element and not HTML markup, use the property instead. 将值分配给将会破坏以前分配使用任何文本值。Assigning a value to will destroy any text values previously assigned using .

## Remarks 元素可将其置于三种方式之一中的 HTML 页： 默认流定位;相对定位中的元素偏移固定量相对于其父级;和绝对定位，在该元素给定固定协调文档相对于文档的左上角位置。Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways: default flow positioning; relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent; and absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document. 当文档的元素使用相对或绝对定位时，你可以使用`OffsetParent`计算的工作区中的元素的坐标位置。When a document's elements use relative or absolute positioning, you can use `OffsetParent` to calculate an element's coordinate position in the client area. 有关详细信息元素定位在 HTML 中，请参阅[有关元素定位](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何和不同于`span1`，`span2`和`span3`:The following code example shows how and differ for `span1`, `span2` and `span3`: ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 中的属性是任何有效的名称-值对，该元素。An attribute in HTML is any valid name-value pair for that element. 公开所有元素，而忽略仅适用于某些类型的元素，则共有的属性`SRC`是预定义的属性`IMG`标记，例如，但不是能为`DIV`标记。 exposes only those attributes that are common to all elements, leaving out those that only apply to certain types of elements; `SRC` is a predefined attribute for the `IMG` tag, for example, but not for the `DIV` tag. 使用和操作不公开上托管的文档对象模型 (DOM) 的属性。Use and to manipulate attributes not exposed on the managed Document Object Model (DOM). 如果`attributeName`不是在元素上，定义的属性定义它的新特性的元素上。If `attributeName` is not a defined attribute on an element, will define it on the element as a new attribute. 和不区分大小写。 and are case-insensitive. 若要设置`class`属性，你必须引用属性作为`className`时指定的第一个参数 To set the `class` attribute on an , you must refer to the attribute as `className` when specifying the first argument to ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新`IMG`元素与当前文档，使用设置`SRC`映像的属性。The following code example adds a new `IMG` element to the current document, using to set the `SRC` attribute for the image. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 使用样式 World Wide Web 协会级联样式表规范中定义以控制元素的显示。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) uses styles as defined in the World Wide Web Consortiums Cascading Style Sheets specification to control the display of an element. 中的样式属性采用分号分隔名称-值对，与每个对，如下所示以分号分隔的格式：Styles in the property take the form of colon-delimited name-value pairs, with each pair separated by a semicolon, as follows: `style-name1:value1;...;[style-nameN:valueN;]` 若要设置的字体`DIV`到 14 点 Times New Roman 粗体的元素，例如，您可以分配以下字符串：To set the font for a `DIV` element to 14-point Times New Roman bold, for example, you would assign the following string: `font-face:Times New Roman;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;` HTML DOM 中的所有可用的样式的完整列表，请参阅[样式属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx)。For a full list of all available styles in the HTML DOM, see [STYLE Attribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定当用户按下 TAB 键时，HTML 文档中的哪个元素下一步将接收焦点。 determines which element in an HTML document will next receive focus when the user presses the TAB key. 默认情况下，包括在 tab 键顺序的仅有元素是`INPUT`元素，`SELECT`控件，并且任何元素其`contentEditable`属性设置为`true`。By default, the only elements included in the tab order are `INPUT` elements, the `SELECT` control, and any element whose `contentEditable` property is set to `true`. 你可以包括任何 HTML 元素的 tab 键顺序，例如`DIV`，通过分配显式。You can include any HTML element in the tab order, such as a `DIV`, by assigning it an explicit . 有效值为-32767 到 32767 之间的范围。Valid values for range from -32767 to 32767.
